section.title: Recovering the Control Plane
section.para: If one or more of your controller nodes has experienced data or disk corruption due to power-loss or hardware failure and you need perform disaster recovery then we provide different scenarios for how to resolve them to get your cloud recovered.

note.para: You should have backed up /etc/group of the lifecycle manager manually after installation. While recovering a lifecycle manager node, manually copy the /etc/group file from a backup of the old lifecycle manager.
